name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Systems Engineer with 10+ years of experience leveraging **Microsoft 365**, **Azure**, and **PowerShell** to deliver secure and efficient systems solutions. Proficient in managing **Azure Policy**, **Conditional Access**, and **Endpoint Security** to maintain compliance with industry standards and enhance organizational security posture. Strong expertise in identity management using **Entra ID**, **SAML**, and **OIDC**, enabling secure user authentication and role-based access control (RBAC).
Skilled in implementing **Microsoft Graph** for streamlined collaboration and data retrieval, and knowledgeable in **Data Loss Prevention (DLP)** strategies and **Microsoft Purview** for data governance. Experienced in incident response and creating efficient workflows that promote teamwork and communication across technical teams.
Brings substantial expertise in software development with a focus on high-performance solutions in healthcare and finance, utilizing technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, and more. Passionate about building systems that are not only technically sound but also drive real-world impact.

experience.responsibilities:
• Demonstrated expertise in **Azure** services, managing and deploying solutions with **Microsoft 365**, **Intune**, and **Defender**, ensuring robust endpoint security and compliance with enterprise policies.
• Developed automation scripts using **PowerShell** to streamline deployment processes, yielding a **30%** reduction in manual effort and time on tasks.
• Implemented **Azure Policy** and **Conditional Access** to enhance security posture, enforcing compliance across cloud resources with a focus on Governance and risk management.
• Managed identity and access management using **Entra ID**, **SAML**, and **OIDC**, ensuring secure and efficient user access to applications for over **1,000** users.
• Designed and executed incident response strategies, reducing potential security threats by **40%** and ensuring timely communication across teams during incidents.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance collaboration using **Microsoft Graph**, integrating seamless communication tools and improving team productivity by **20%**.
• Established Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies using **Microsoft Purview**, protecting sensitive information and achieving compliance with industry standards within **6 months**.
• Configured role-based access control (RBAC) to manage permissions effectively, optimizing workflow and security across multiple systems.
• Oversaw endpoint security measures, implementing network fundamentals to protect organizational data and systems from unauthorized access.
• Facilitated training sessions on best practices for using Microsoft technologies, enhancing team skills and knowledge in security and collaboration solutions.

• Utilized **Microsoft 365** and **Azure** to enhance system efficiency and security, implementing **Conditional Access** and **RBAC** protocols to ensure compliance and protect sensitive financial data.
• Developed and maintained **PowerShell** scripts for automating routine tasks, enhancing operational workflows by reducing manual intervention by **50%**.
• Managed user identities using **Entra ID** and integrated **Microsoft Graph** to streamline user access and monitoring across various applications, resulting in a **30%** reduction in access-related incidents.
• Implemented **Intune** for endpoint security management, ensuring compliance with company policies and enhancing device security across the organization.
• Conducted **Incident Response** activities effectively, achieving an **80%** resolution rate for security incidents within **24** hours through streamlined communication and collaboration.
• Configured **Microsoft Defender** for proactive threat detection and response, significantly improving the organization's cybersecurity posture against potential threats.
• Integrated **DLP** solutions to safeguard sensitive financial information, leading to a decrease in data leaks by **40%**.
• Established a robust framework for **Network Fundamentals** and implemented **Azure Policy** for resource management, ensuring compliance with industry standards and internal protocols.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver effective solutions, enhancing communication and collaboration across different departments and achieving project milestones ahead of schedule.

Implemented robust **Microsoft 365** solutions enhancing collaboration and communication while ensuring seamless integration with **Azure** and other tools like **PowerShell** and **Microsoft Graph**.
Managed identity and access management solutions with **Entra ID**, enforcing **Conditional Access** policies to safeguard sensitive data and maintain compliance through **DLP** strategies.
Configured and maintained **Endpoint Security** solutions, ensuring comprehensive protection against threats while supporting incident response protocols and improving the organization's cybersecurity posture.
Developed and enforced **RBAC** and **SCIM** protocols for effective user access control, aligning with industry standards including **SAML** and **OIDC** for secure authentication processes.
Utilized **Intune** for device management, ensuring compliance and efficient deployment of organizational policies across a fleet of **9,000** devices, enhancing user experience and device security.
Conducted thorough **Microsoft Purview** assessments to identify and mitigate data risks, resulting in compliance improvements across **3 major policies** related to data governance.
Executed **Azure Policy** to enforce compliance standards across cloud resources, drastically reducing misconfigurations by **30%** following audits.
Facilitated collaboration across teams while leading training sessions on incident response and network fundamentals, improving overall team incident response time by **25%**.
